Cloud Kicks leadership wants to improve the new customer onboarding experience. There are a number of complex handoffs between teams. Service managers have been tasked with working with the operations team to improve the handoff between Salesforce and internal systems. The business analyst (BA) wants to break down the onboarding processes and sub-processes into simpler steps.

What should the BA create to engage stakeholders?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
You cant make sweeping changes without documenting the initial process first - may not even need to go to omnichannel the existing rules may just need a tweak to work better etc

questions.question_text:
A business analyst (BA) discovers that Universal Containers (UC) has automated case assignments in Service Cloud. UC uses case assignment rules to route cases to a predefined team. The UC leadership team wants to improve how cases are routed.

What should the BA recommend to help UC resolve a common obstacle?

choices.C: Migrate from case assignment rules to Omni-Channel.
choices.A: Minimize case escalations to reduce time to resolution.
choices.B: Document the current case assignment process.

questions.question_text:
Sales managers at Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) have received feedback from sales reps that record pages are slow and often take longer to load when using the app on the phone. The business analyst (BA) has been asked to evaluate NTO's org to find out which pages are the slowest to load when using the app on the phone.
What is the first step the BA should take to help resolve the issue?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
(c) is always the first response to any bug report
(b) is the seconda step
(a) is not relevant

comments.content:
"C. Confirm steps to reproduce the issue." would be more like step 2. 

"While confirming the steps to reproduce the reported issue is an essential troubleshooting step, it may not be the first action to take when addressing performance issues on the mobile app. Prioritizing performance analysis allows for a more proactive and systematic approach to identifying and resolving performance issues in the Salesforce org."

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Not A: Shouldnt just create a new layout without a specific reason for doing so

Probably Not B: Performance Analyzer sounds like a differrent program - which isn't really a SF thing - 'Page Analysis' for lightning page layouts is a thing and would make more sense as an answer

C: Confirm steps to reproduce the issue with why the pages are loading slow (ie as soon as you open the page, Edit the page etc) Once that you can take steps to fix

Selected Answer: C
The first step the business analyst (BA) should take to help resolve the issue of slow record pages when using the app on the phone is to confirm the steps to reproduce the problem.

choices.A: Create a new page layout for the phone.
choices.B: Use performance analyzer to view the assessment.
choices.C: Confirm steps to reproduce the issue.

choices.C: Ensure the workshop schedule considers time zones and language differences.
choices.B: Describe work with other companies that has solved similar problems.

questions.question_text: Which step should a business analyst take to establish credibility and convey empathy with stakeholders during discovery sessions for a new Experience site?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The step that best establishes credibility and conveys empathy is C. Ensure the workshop schedule considers time zones and language differences.

Here's why:

This action demonstrates respect for the stakeholders' time and acknowledges their diverse backgrounds. It shows that the BA is considerate and understands the challenges they might face. This builds trust and fosters a collaborative environment, which is crucial for establishing credibility and empathy.

questions.question_text:
A business analyst (BA) at Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) is assigned to a project to help revamp NTO's sales process. The current process used by the sales team is different than the process outlined in NTO's documentation.

Which step should the BA take first?

choices.A: Meet with stakeholders as a group to understand the current state.
choices.B: Create an Entity Relationship Diagram (ERD) of the current state.
choices.C: Meet with stakeholders as a group to capture future requirements.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
The BA should first A. Meet with stakeholders as a group to understand the current state.

It's crucial to understand the as-is process before attempting to define the to-be process. Since the documented process differs from the actual process used by the sales team, the BA needs to gather information directly from the source: the sales team and other relevant stakeholders.
